title: Blade Ward
content:
Blade Ward Abjuration Cantrip Take only half of the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks. 2 turns Action

Abjuration Cantrip

Take only half of the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks.

Blade ward is an Abjuration Cantrip in Baldur's Gate 3. Grants the caster resistance to damage from weapons.

BG3 Blade Ward Information

Description: Take only half of the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks. Level: Cantrip School: Abjuration Casting Time: Action Range: Self Duration: 2 turns

How to Acquire Blade Ward

Blade Ward can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Eldritch Knight, Arcane Trickster Blade Ward can be acquired by the following items: Hellrider's Pride

Bard, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Eldritch Knight, Arcane Trickster

Hellrider's Pride

Blade Ward Tips & Notes

Differences from D&D 5th Edition: None. Although the duration seems longer, 2 Turns means it will expire at the end of your next turn, just like 5E.
